metadata.Title: CVE-2017-9061 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In WordPress before 4.7.5, a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists when attempting to upload very large files, because the error message does not properly restrict presentation of the filename.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
